entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `reference_no` TEXT NOT NULL, `record_type` TEXT NOT NULL, `payload` TEXT NOT NULL, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updated_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_synced` INTEGER NOT NULL, `synced_at` INTEGER, `sync_attempts` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_error` TEXT, `backend_id` INTEGER, `user_id` TEXT, `device_fingerprint` TEXT)

indices.name: index_sync_records_is_synced
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_sync_records_is_synced` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`is_synced`)

indices.name: index_sync_records_record_type
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_sync_records_record_type` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`record_type`)

indices.name: index_sync_records_created_at
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_sync_records_created_at` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`created_at`)

indices.name: index_sync_records_reference_no
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_sync_records_reference_no` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`reference_no`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, `level` TEXT NOT NULL, `tag` TEXT NOT NULL, `message` TEXT NOT NULL, `extra_data` TEXT)

indices.name: index_app_logs_timestamp
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_app_logs_timestamp` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`timestamp`)

indices.name: index_app_logs_level
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_app_logs_level` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`level`)

indices.name: index_app_logs_tag
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_app_logs_tag` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`tag`)
